comments.content: What steps will reproduce the problem? 1. Compile any file containing an empty, without whitespace, block comment: /**/ 2. Compiler reports: JSC_PARSE_ERROR: Parse error. Unexpected end of file AFAIK "/**/" is valid JS syntax and should thus simply be treated as a comment (if not, the error message should still be changed to be relevant). Regards / Fredrik Blomqvist
note: the compiler reports this as a warning. Compilation continues successfully and produces working code.
This issue was closed by revision 450f0f6ef5d9.
